inclusion.criterion: Age greater than 18 years and less than 30 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have had diabetes for at least 1 year, and in good control (HbA1C less than 8.5 %)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Be on continuous subcutaneous insulin infusion using an insulin pump
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Subjects must be otherwise healthy except for T1DM, and treated for hypothyroidism if present
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Menstruating women must have negative pregnancy test.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Weight must be equal to or greater than 50 Kg
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Any chronic disease (leukemia, asthma, inflammatory bowel disease, cystic fibrosis, juvenile rheumatoid arthritis, etc that directly, or as a result of treatment, affect glucose homeostasis)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Lack of a supportive family environment
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Positive pregnancy test based on serum beta HCG in menstruating young women
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Evidence or history of chemical abuse
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is homeless and has lost his supply of insulin, syringes, glucometer, and glucose testing supplies. He has had previous episodes of diabetic ketoacidosis.
